Queen's Decree|@18:Increased Accuracy Rating|10-15:Minions have increased maximum Life|10-15:Minions deal increased Damage|1:To Maximum number of Zombies|1:To Maximum number of Spectres|2:To Maximum number of Skeletons|150-200:Increased Skeleton Duration|25:Increased Strength Requirement ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Queen%27s_Decree 
Rigvald's Charge|@18:Increased Accuracy Rating|120-150:Increased Physical Damage|20:Increased Attack Speed|150-200:To Accuracy Rating|10:Increased Movement Speed ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Rigvald%27s_Charge 
Shiversting|@18:Increased Accuracy Rating|80-100:Increased Physical Damage|35-70:Adds Cold Damage|3:Of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana|Cannot be Frozen ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Shiversting 
Terminus Est|@18:Increased Accuracy Rating|120-180:Increased Physical Damage|20:Increased Attack Speed|10:Mana Gained on Kill|10:Increased Movement Speed|Gain a Frenzy Charge on Critical Strike ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Terminus_Est 

; -------- Flasks (8) ---------

Doedre's Elixir|20:Removes of your maximum Energy Shield on use|10:You take of your maximum Life as Chaos Damage on use|You gain a Power Charge on use|You gain a Frenzy Charge on use|You gain an Endurance Charge on use|50-100:Increased Charges used ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Doedre%27s_Elixir 
Lavianga's Spirit|30-50:Increased Amount Recovered|100:Increased Recovery Speed|Your Skills have no Mana Cost during flask effect ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Lavianga%27s_Spirit 
Divination Distillate|40-60:Increased Rarity of Items found during flask effect|12-18:Increased Quantity of Items found during flask effect|25:Increased Light Radius during flask effect|6:To all maximum Elemental Resistances during flask effect ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Divination_Distillate 
Atziri's Promise|10:Of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during flask effect|22-25:Gain of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect|13-15:Gain of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Atziri%27s_Promise 
Forbidden Taste|50:Increased Charges used|75:Recover of your maximum Life on use|8:Of maximum Life taken as Chaos Damage per Second ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Forbidden_Taste 
Rumi's Concoction|20-30:Chance to Block during flask effect|10-15:Chance to Block Spells during flask effect ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Rumi%27s_Concoction 
Taste of Hate|30:Of Physical Damage taken as Cold Damage during flask effect|30:Gain of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect|30:Chance to Avoid being Chilled during flask effect|30:Chance to Avoid being Frozen during flask effect ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Taste_of_Hate 
Blood of the Karui|10:Increased Recovery Speed|No Life Recovery Applies during flask effect|Recover Full Life at the end of the flask effect ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Blood_of_the_Karui 

; -------- Maps (11) ---------

Acton's Nightmare|Area has patches of burning ground|Area is inhabited by Skeletons|220-250:Increased Rarity of Items found in this Area|Restless Dead|Area is a large Maze|Area contains a Large Chest ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Acton%27s_Nightmare 
The Coward's Trial|22-25:Area has waves of monsters|30-50:Area has seconds between monster waves ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/The_Coward%27s_Trial 
Death and Taxes|50-60:Unique Boss deals Damage and attacks faster|10000:Unique Boss gives increased Experience ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Death_and_Taxes 
Hall of Grandmasters|Contains the Immortalised Grandmasters ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Hall_of_Grandmasters 
Maelström of Chaos|Area has patches of chilled ground|50:Monsters deal extra Damage as Lightning|Monsters are immune to randomly chosen elemental status ailments or stun|Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Curses on Hit|Monsters reflect Curses|200-400:Increased Rarity of Items found in this Area ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Maelstr%C3%B6m_of_Chaos 
Mao Kun|175-190:Monsters deal extra Damage as Lightning|3:Monsters gain Endurance Charges every seconds|3:Monsters gain Power Charges every seconds ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Mao_Kun 
Oba's Cursed Trove|Area has patches of Desecrated Ground|40-50:Increased Monster Life|30-40:Increased Monster Damage|Area becomes fatal after some time ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Oba%27s_Cursed_Trove 
Olmec's Sanctum|40-50:Increased Monster Life|30-40:Increased Monster Damage|Final Boss drops higher Level Items ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Olmec%27s_Sanctum 
Poorjoy's Asylum|140-160:Increased Monster Life|140-160:Increased Monster Damage|25:Increased Monster Movement Speed|25:Increased Monster Attack Speed|25:Increased Monster Cast Speed|250:Increased Rarity of Items found in this Area|Area is a Large Maze|150:Increased Experience gain|10-15:Unique Boss drops additional Rare Item Class ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Poorjoy%27s_Asylum 
Vaults of Atziri|1800-2000:Chests have increased Item Rarity|Area contains no monsters ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Vaults_of_Atziri 
Whakawairua Tuahu|Area contains many Totems|50:Curses have reduced effect on Monsters|120-160:Increased Rarity of Items found in this Area|Rare Monsters each have a Nemesis Mod ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Whakawairua_Tuahu 

; -------- Claws (6) ---------

Al Dhih|@8:Life gained for each enemy hit by your Attacks|60-80:Increased Physical Damage|15:Of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life|10:Reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon|10:Gems in this item have Chance to cause Enemies to Flee on Hit ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Al_Dhih 
Bloodseeker|@3:Of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life|100-120:Increased Physical Damage|10-12:Adds Physical Damage|5:Increased Attack Speed|6:Of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life|5:Increased Movement Speed|Life Leech from Hits with this Weapon applies instantly ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Bloodseeker 
Cybil's Paw|@15:Life gained for each enemy hit by your Attacks|8-12:Increased Cast Speed|30-40:To maximum Mana|5-8:Life gained for each enemy hit by your Spells|6:Increased Spell Damage per Block Chance ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Cybil%27s_Paw 
Essentia Sanguis|@3:Of Physical Damage Leeched as Life|8:Additional Chance to Block while Dual Wielding Claws|140-180:Increased Physical Damage|1-80:Adds Lightning Damage|20-30:Increased Attack Speed|30-40:To maximum Energy Shield|Ghost Reaver ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Essentia_Sanguis 
Last Resort|@3:Life gained for each enemy hit by your Attacks|25:Increased Attack Speed when on Low Life|80-100:Increased Physical Damage|2-10:Adds Physical Damage|100:Increased Claw Physical Damage when on Low Life|100:Increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Last_Resort 
Mortem Morsu|@6:Of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life|75-100:Increased Physical Damage|20:Increased Attack Speed|25:Increased Critical Strike Chance|25:Increased Global Critical Strike Multiplier|10-20:Of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage|Poisonous Hit|25:Reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon ; http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Mortem_Morsu
